entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a member of Harry's group and is present in the scene. He points his wand at the golden cup.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a member of Harry's group and is present in the scene. She points her wand at the golden cup and tries to summon it with 'Accio Cup!'

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who had told Harry's group about the plan. He is present in the scene and warns them that 'Accio Cup' won't work.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of his group and is present in the scene. He tries to figure out how to get the golden cup without touching anything.

entities.name: helga hufflepuff
entities.description: Helga Hufflepuff is mentioned as the previous owner of the golden cup.

entities.name: hepzibah smith
entities.description: Hepzibah Smith is mentioned as the person from whom Tom Riddle stole the golden cup.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as the one who stole the golden cup from Hepzibah Smith.

relationships.description: Harry asks Griphook for help in getting the golden cup.
Hermione tries to summon the golden cup with 'Accio Cup!'
Griphook warns Harry's group that 'Accio Cup' won't work.
Harry asks Hermione to give him the sword so he can touch something with it.
